Name: Ela Excellence Resort Belek
Description: A one-of-a-kind holiday paradise nestled in Belek, Antalya's beautiful nature and the mesmerising blue of the Mediterranean. Antalya Airport is at 34 km away from the hotel. The resort has a beachfront location, it features a spa and a Turkish bath, and there is a mini golf, table tennis pool games and more.it offers nine restaurants with a variety of modern and traditional cuisines. The large number of restaurants, and bars at the hotel are true culinary delights, gathered traditions and flavours from around the world under one roof. Customers can delight themselves on the sun loungers next to the outdoor swimming pool area that includes five water slides and four water parks, or take refreshment in the pool bar. The hotel is the perfect place to enjoy family activities and hotel amenities with exotic views and exciting activities. It is the perfect choice for any vacation; the hotel boasts spectacular beaches, outstanding service, and thrilling activities.

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
